resources.string: Lorem Ipsum is simply placeholder text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry\'s standard placeholder text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book"
Incomplete proxy settings. For HTTP proxy we require both hostname and port settings.
Some of the specified package names do not correspond to any installed packages.
Would you like to cancel the current VPN Connection?
Here you can change the default website which loads on start of Browser. Enter\"about:blank\" to get an smpty start site.
Here you can enter a custom user agent. Let empty to use defaul one
Here you can enter a custom search URL Also choose \"Custom search engine\" as search provider
Here you can choose your preffered search engine or set a custom one
Clear your browser data or decide what data will be cleared when you leave the aplication
Decide which components of the browser will be enabled on start
Change the behavior and ui of the app to suit your preferences
To show the filter dialog long press on the bookmark icon in the overview. Decide which filters you will use
Use gestures on the toolbar and the \"Navigation button\"
Import and export several app data(whitelist, bookmarks)
Open the system app settings for \"Browser\". There you can, depending on your Android version grant permissions, clear the app data and so on.
Delete the whole database (Startpage, bookmarks,history and all whitelist)
Every time you quit all above checked data will be deleted
This will delete all your current settings and data. Will you proceed?
Enable Network images. Disabling could be useful to save mobile data and to load websites faster
Allow websites to access your location.\nSome websites(like Google, maps for navigation) need this enabled
Save the history of visited websites
Tell websites that you would prefer to save data. Supported websites will load faster
Enable JavaScript. Many websites need JavaScript for their functionality (menus, loading and displaying images,…). But they are also a rist and acan be used for attacks
Enable AdBlockto block annoying ads. Sites also load faster when enabled

Enable Cookies. Cookies are small text files, which are stored on your device. Websites use themfor example to store user settings (for example search settings). But they could also be used to collect personal user data. Third party cookies (they collect user data for advertising) are always disabled.
Confirmation dialog when closing a tab
Reopen a new tab when the last tab is closed instead of exiting the browser
Charge the font size for displaying websites
if checked, content will be rendered in a inverted gray scale mode. This is a kind of night mode
Use the whole screen when scrolling through website if you press the back button you will leave fullscreen mode
Pressing back will make the toolbar visible, before going back in history
Decide where the Navigation button will be placed
What should be shown at the start of the Overview? The Start Page, your bookmarks,…
Open the Overview on every app start
if enabled, all cookies will be deleted. Also the Cookies of trusted websites.
All files will be exportednto the directory of your sd: card. This directory will be DELETE.D if you uninstall \"Screen Mirroring\". So make a backup regularly on a save place.
Export app data(Storage + previews, History Bookmarks) and uour personal settings
Make sure your phone and TV are connected to the same Wi-Fi network.
Stop mirroring when connection\nto target is lost
Your target device has to be in the same Wi-Fi network as this device, because Screen Mirror is transmitting your screen.
Stream your device’s screen over Wi-Fi to your computer, notebook or tablet
